question: Which head coach has led their team for a longer period of time, Tim Cluess or Steve Prohm?
llm_answer:
Based on the provided evidence, it is unclear which head coach has led their team for a longer period of time, Tim Cluess or Steve Prohm.

For Tim Cluess, the evidence shows that he was in his 5th year as head coach in the 2014-2015 season and his 6th year as head coach in the 2015-2016 season. This suggests that he has been the head coach for at least 6 years.

For Steve Prohm, the evidence shows that he was in his 1st year as head coach at Murray State in the 2011-2012 season and his 1st year as head coach at Iowa State in the 2015-2016 season. This suggests that he has been the head coach for at least 4 years.

However, the evidence does not provide information on the duration of Steve Prohm's tenure as head coach at Murray State before he joined Iowa State. Therefore, it is unclear whether Steve Prohm has led his team for a longer period of time than Tim Cluess.
